interestingcomments.content: ... So if you have DNG and JPEG enabled, then this counts as two images. ... Albert, This surprises me. When I shoot DNG and Jpeg both files have the same file number, eg 1037969.dng and 1037969,jpg and since the shutter has only actuated once I can't see how the CPU could increment by 1 for DNG and by 2 for DNG and Jpeg.--img--  Have I misunderstood you?--img--  Pete.
interestingcomments.MarkedSent: ... So if you have DNG and JPEG enabled, then this counts as two images. ... Albert, This surprises me. When I shoot DNG and Jpeg both files have the same file number, eg 1037969.dng and 1037969,jpg and since the shutter has only actuated once I can't see how the CPU could increment by 1 for DNG and by 2 for DNG and Jpeg.--img--  Have I misunderstood you?--img--  Pete.
